department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Electrical Repairs and Replacement work on an as and when requested basis.
description: Journeyperson Electricians required. Location is in Greenwood, Nova Scotia with request for low cost. There is a specification for the complete details. Interested readers should contact Richard Parsons at richard.parsons@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca before the deadline.
duration_in_months: Valid until 2024-04-13, with potential for renewal in the future
